atk-s0501a1:2_3: paññattito sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṁ vā saccābhisambodhimupādāya paññattito sattaviseso buddho. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a1:3_0: ‘‘Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhi,
atk-s0501a1:5_0: Byañjanato pana ‘‘bujjhitāti buddho, bodhetāti buddho’’ti evamādinā nayena veditabbo. Vuttañcetaṁ –
atk-s0501a1:6_24: vimokkhantikametaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṁ buddho’’ti (mahāni. 192; cūḷani.
atk-s0501a1:7_0: Ettha ca yathā loke avagantā avagatoti vuccati,
atk-s0501a1:7_4: Sabbaññutāya buddhoti sabbadhammabujjhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0501a1:7_5: Sabbadassāvitāya buddhoti sabbadhammabodhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0501a1:7_6: Anaññaneyyatāya buddhoti aññena abodhito sayameva buddhattā buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0501a1:7_7: Vikasitāya buddhoti nānāguṇavikasanato padumamiva vikasanaṭṭhena buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0501a1:7_8: Khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddhoti evamādīhi cittasaṅkocakaradhammapahānato niddākkhayavibuddho puriso viya
atk-s0501a1:7_10: Ekāyanamaggaṁ gatoti buddhoti buddhiyatthānaṁ gamanatthapariyāyato yathā maggaṁ gatopi puriso gatoti vuccati,
atk-s0501a1:7_11: evaṁ ekāyanamaggaṁ gatattāpi buddhoti vuccatīti dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-s0501a1:7_12: Eko anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhoti buddhoti na parehi buddhattā buddho,
atk-s0501a1:7_13: kintu sayameva anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhattā buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti .
atk-s0501a1:7_14: Abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddhoti buddhi buddhaṁ bodhoti pariyāyavacanametaṁ.
atk-s0501a1:7_17: evaṁ buddhiguṇayogato buddhoti ñāpetuṁ vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0501a1:7_18: Tato paraṁ buddhoti netaṁ nāmanti evamādi atthamanugatā ayaṁ paññattīti bodhanatthaṁ vuttanti evarūpena
atk-s0501a1:7_19: nayena sabbesaṁ padānaṁ buddhasaddassa sādhanasamattho attho veditabbo.
atk-s0501a1:10_1: saraṇagatānaṁ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṁ santāsaṁ dukkhaṁ duggatiṁ parikkilesaṁ hiṁsati vidhamati nīharati nirodhetīti attho.
atk-s0501a1:10_2: Atha vā hite pavattanena ahitā ca nivattanena sattānaṁ bhayaṁ hiṁsatīti buddho,
atk-s0501a1:10_5: Tasmā imināpi pariyāyena taṁ ratanattayaṁ saraṇaṁ.
atk-s0501a1:10_6: Tappasādataggarutāhi vihataviddhaṁsitakileso tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto aparappaccayo vā cittuppādo saraṇagamanaṁ.
atk-s0501a1:10_9: esa me parāyaṇa’’nti evametaṁ upetīti attho .
atk-s0501a1:10_13: upāsake no bhagavā dhāretū’’ti tapussabhallikādayo viya samādānena vā,
atk-s0501a1:10_17: ‘‘evaṁ vutte brahmāyu brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā
atk-s0501a1:10_18: tikkhattuṁ udānaṁ udānesi ‘namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
atk-s0501a1:10_23: ariyapuggalā viya saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedena vāti anekappakāraṁ visayato kiccato ca upeti.
atk-s0501a1:13_1: gamanīyañca dīpaye’’ti vuttānaṁ bhedādīnaṁ ayaṁ dīpanā,
atk-s0501a1:13_8: Buddhaguṇesu aññāṇasaṁsayamicchāñāṇappavattiyā anādarādippavattiyā ca tesaṁ saraṇaṁ saṁkiliṭṭhaṁ hoti.
atk-s0501a1:13_9: Ariyapuggalā pana abhinnasaraṇā ceva asaṁkiliṭṭhasaraṇā ca honti.
atk-s0501a1:13_13: yaṁ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo aññaṁ satthāraṁ uddiseyyā’’ti (a. ni. 1.276; ma. ni. 3.128; vibha. 809).
atk-s0501a1:13_14: Puthujjanā tu yāvadeva saraṇabhedaṁ na pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0501a1:13_19: abhedo pana phalato iṭṭhameva phalaṁ deti.
atk-s0501a1:15_0: ‘‘Yekeci buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṁ;
atk-s0501a1:16_0: Pahāya mānusaṁ dehaṁ, devakāyaṁ paripūressantī’’ti. (dī. ni. 2.332; saṁ. ni. 1.37);
atk-s0501a1:17_0: Tatra ca ye saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedena saraṇaṁ gatā,
atk-s0501a1:17_2: Itare pana saraṇagamanena na gamissantīti evaṁ gāthāya adhippāyo veditabbo.
atk-s0501a1:20_1: ‘‘buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmī’’ti ettha yo buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchati,
atk-s0501a1:20_2: esa buddhaṁ vā gaccheyya saraṇaṁ vā,
atk-s0501a1:20_3: ubhayathāpi ca ekassa vacanaṁ niratthakaṁ. Kasmā?
atk-s0501a1:20_5: Na hettha ‘‘ajaṁ gāmaṁ netī’’tiādīsu viya dvikammakattaṁ akkharacintakā icchanti.
atk-s0501a1:21_4: Etesañhi samānādhikaraṇabhāve adhippete paṭihatacittopi buddhaṁ upasaṅkamanto buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato siyā.
atk-s0501a1:21_11: Tattheva hi gāthāpade etaṁ buddhādiratanattayaṁ saraṇagatānaṁ bhayaharaṇattasaṅkhāte saraṇabhāve abyabhicaraṇato
atk-s0501a1:21_13: aññattha tu gamisambandhe sati saraṇagamanassa appasiddhito anadhippetoti asādhakametaṁ.
atk-s0501a1:21_15: sabbadukkhā pamuccatī’’ti ettha gamisambandhepi saraṇagamanapasiddhito samānādhikaraṇattamevāti ce?
atk-s0501a1:21_17: Tatrāpi hi samānādhikaraṇabhāve sati etaṁ buddhadhammasaṅghasaraṇaṁ paṭihatacittopi āgamma sabbadukkhā
atk-s0501a1:21_18: pamucceyyāti evaṁ pubbe vuttadosappasaṅgo eva siyā,
atk-s0501a1:21_19: na ca no dosena atthi atthoti asādhakametaṁ.
atk-s0501a1:21_21: kalyāṇamittaṁ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccantī’’ti (saṁ. ni.
atk-s0501a1:21_22: 1.129) ettha bhagavato kalyāṇamittassa ānubhāvena parimuccamānā sattā ‘‘kalyāṇamittaṁ āgamma parimuccantī’’ti vuttā.
atk-s0501a1:21_24: sabbadukkhā pamuccatī’’ti vuttoti evamettha adhippāyo veditabbo.
atk-s0501a1:22_0: Evaṁ sabbathāpi na buddhassa gamanīyattaṁ yujjati,
atk-s0501a1:23_5: hitassa ca vidhātāti iminā adhippāyena etaṁ gacchāmi bhajāmi sevāmi payirupāsāmi,
atk-s0501a1:23_7: Yesañhi dhātūnaṁ gatiattho buddhipi tesaṁ atthoti.
atk-s0501a1:23_8: Iti-saddassa appayogā ayuttamiti ce? Taṁ na.
atk-s0501a1:23_11: tato ‘‘aniccaṁ rūpaṁ aniccaṁ rūpanti yathābhūtaṁ pajānātī’’ti evamādīsu (saṁ. ni. 3.55,
atk-s0501a1:23_16: ‘‘Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca saṅghañca saraṇaṁ gato’’ti evamādīsu (dha. pa.
atk-s0501a1:23_18: na ca vijjamānatthasambhavā iti-saddā sabbattha payujjanti,
atk-s0501a1:23_19: appayuttassāpettha payuttassa viya iti-saddassa attho viññātabbo aññesu ca evaṁjātikesu,
atk-s0501a1:23_24: 34) saraṇasseva gamanīyato yaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘gamanākāradassanatthaṁ tu saraṇavacana’’nti,
atk-s0501a1:23_29: yato pubbasadisameva appayuttopi payutto viya veditabbo.
atk-s0501a1:23_30: Itarathā hi pubbe vuttadosappasaṅgo eva siyā,
atk-s0501a1:26_2: yvāyaṁ ‘‘buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmī’’ti ettha atthavaṇṇanānayo vutto,
atk-s0501a1:26_4: saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmī’’ti etasmimpi padadvaye esova veditabbo.
atk-s0501a1:26_5: Tatrāpi hi dhammasaṅghānaṁ atthato byañjanato ca vibhāvanamattameva asadisaṁ,
atk-s0501a1:26_10: Bhāvitamaggānaṁ sacchikatanibbānānañca apāyesu apatanabhāvena dhāraṇato paramassāsavidhānato ca maggavirāgā
atk-s0501a1:26_11: eva imasmiṁ atthe dhammoti amhākaṁ khanti,
atk-s0501a1:26_16: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṁ aggamakkhāyatī’’ti evamādi (a. ni. 4.34; itivu. 90).
atk-s0501a1:27_0: Catubbidhaariyamaggasamaṅgīnaṁ catusāmaññaphalasamadhivāsitakhandhasantānānañca puggalānaṁ samūho diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātena saṁhatattā saṅgho.
atk-s0501a1:28_1: ye vo mayā dhammā abhiññā desitā,
atk-s0501a1:28_11: imesu dhammesu dvepi bhikkhū nānāvāde’’ti (ma. ni. 3.43).
atk-s0501a1:29_1: Sutte ca ‘‘āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā’’ti (itivu. 90; a. ni. 4.34,
atk-s0501a1:29_3: Etaṁ pana saraṇaṁ gatassa aññasmimpi bhikkhusaṅghe vā bhikkhunisaṅghe vā buddhappamukhe vā saṅghe sammutisaṅghe
atk-s0501a1:29_4: vā catuvaggādibhede ekapuggalepi vā bhagavantaṁ uddissa pabbajite vandanādikiriyāya saraṇagamanaṁ neva
atk-s0501a1:29_7: Vuttāvasesantu imassa dutiyassa ca saraṇagamanassa bhedābhedādividhānaṁ pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0501a1:31_1: kāraṇañca viniddiseti ettha etesu ca tīsu saraṇavacanesu sabbasattānaṁ aggoti katvā paṭhamaṁ buddho,
atk-s0501a1:31_3: tassa dhammassa ādhārakato tadāsevanato ca ante saṅgho.
atk-s0501a1:31_4: Sabbasattānaṁ vā hite niyojakoti katvā paṭhamaṁ buddho,
atk-s0501a1:31_6: hitādhigamāya paṭipanno adhigatahito cāti katvā ante saṅgho saraṇabhāvena vavatthapetvā pakāsitoti evaṁ anupubbavavatthāne kāraṇañca viniddise.
atk-s0501a1:33_11: daḍḍhavanattā khettabhūto viya bhūmibhāgo daḍḍhakilesattā puññakkhettabhūto saṅgho.
atk-s0501a1:33_23: samuppāṭitapaṭalo vippasannalocano viya jano samuppāṭitamohapaṭalo vippasannañāṇalocano saṅgho.
atk-s0501a1:33_24: Sānusayakilesabyādhiharaṇasamatthatāya vā kusalo vejjo viya buddho,
atk-s0501a1:33_26: bhesajjapayogena samupasantabyādhi viya janasamudāyo samupasantakilesabyādhānusayo saṅgho.
atk-s0501a1:34_1: sumaggo viya khemantabhūmi viya ca dhammo,
atk-s0501a1:34_11: yathādhippāyaṁ laddhadhano viya jano sammāladdhaariyadhano saṅgho.
atk-s0501a1:35_20: candanupabhogena santapariḷāho viya jano saddhammūpabhogena santapariḷāho saṅgho.
atk-s0501a1:36_0: Ettāvatā ca yā pubbe ‘‘kena kattha kadā kasmā,
atk-s0501a1:36_1: bhāsitaṁ saraṇattaya’’ntiādīhi catūhi gāthāhi atthavaṇṇanāya mātikā nikkhittā,
